descriptionHtml:
The Ragmar Conspiracy
A plot to kill a king wiped from history and now lost in the mists of time.
But nothing can ever by completely removed; a single copy of an ancient account of the events survived lying forgotten in a private library for centuries.
Forgotten until it was unearthed in a crate of old books, a crate of books given to the amateur historian Gulthar.

Track down Gultharâ€™s Journal and discover why he is in hiding in fear of his life.
Follow the clues to find if any of the four Ragmar Tombs have survived the centuries.
Then deal with those who want Gulthar dead.

To begin this search look for the note that Gulthar has left for you on the bar in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.

This is my first mod; it is the first of the four Ragmar tombs. If people like it I will carry on with the other three.

The tomb is a new interior, so there should be no conflict problems. The only changes to existing world spaces are the tomb entrance, sited in an area away from all existing structures, but still easily accessible, and the placement of one note and one journal within world spaces. All further notes and journals will be in new interiors.
The tomb is fully navmeshed and optimised. 

Version 1.1 Changes:
Optimisation portal moved to address a vanishing floor section upon re-entering tomb
Linen sheets moved to stop flickering
Floating sarcophagus top lowered
Slightly mis-aligned stair section re-aligned
author: Dennis

files.name: The Ragmar Conspiracy
files.changelogHtml:

Flickering Linen sheet moved stop flickering
Floating sarcophagus top lowered
Slightly mis-aligned Stair section re-aligned
